DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety, tolerability and distribution and elimination of a novel therapeutic drug when administered to Healthy Volunteers. In addition its effects on some inflammatory parameters will be measured in presence or absence of lipopolysaccharide stimulation.
DOC.brief_title: First in Human Study of an Anti-Toll-like Receptor 4 (TLR4) Monoclonal Antibody (NI-0101) in Adult Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy adults between 18 and 40 years old (inclusive) having a body mass index (BMI) between 18 and 30 kg/m2 (inclusive), able to adhere to study protocol requirements and having signed informed consent. Any abnormal past or present clinically relevant medical history or any relevant abnormal laboratory parameters at screening that will prevent to consider the volunteers as healthy for the study.
